instagram.label: Visit the New York State Instagram account.

title.label: View all New York State services

twitter.label: Visit the New York State Twitter account.

httpError.concurrentEdit: This service has been changed since you started editing it. Please refresh the page and make your edits again.
httpError.duplicateID: This service could not be saved because of a duplicate ID. Choose a service ID that has not been used before and then save your edits again.
httpError.generic: Something went wrong on our end. Please try to go back to Manage Services.
httpError.generic404: We can't find the page you're looking for. Please try to go back to Manage Services.
httpError.label: There has been an error.
httpError.missingLocale: The locale ({{locale}}) you're looking for is not supported. Please try to go back to Manage Services.
httpError.missingService: We can't find information about the service you're looking for ({{service}}). Please try to go back to Manage Services.
httpError.missingServiceForLocale: We can't find information about the service ({{service}}) whose locale ({{locale}}) you're looking for. Please try to go back to Manage Services.
httpError.saveFailed: We were unable to save your changes. Please refresh the page and make your edits again.
httpError.title: Oops...
httpError.validationFailed: This service could not be saved because one or more fields were reported as invalid by the server.

authentication.authFailedRedirect: You will be redirected to the home screen after 10 seconds.

manageServices.display: Services are displayed in ranked order. Use the arrows to change the ranking of services.
manageServices.name: Name
manageServices.saveMessage: Your changes to {{service}} have been saved.
manageServices.title: All Services ({{count}})

missingFieldError: This field is required and cannot be blank.

updateService.addDetails: Add details to see a preview of your service

appURL.description: Enter the URL of the site where residents can apply for the service. If provided, it must be a full URL that begins with 'http' or 'https'
appURL.error: If an application URL is provided, it must be a valid URL
appURL.title: Application URL

description.description: Describe the benefits that the resident may receive from this.
description.title: Short description

eligibility.description: List the additional criteria the resident should see before applying. Use <1>Markdown</1>, if desired, to include paragraphs, italics, bold, links, or lists in this field.
eligibility.title: Additional criteria

formula.description: Enter the formula to calculate whether we should recommend this service to a resident. Leave the formula blank to display the service lower in the list under 'More services'.

guidelines.booleanRequirement: The formula must evaluate to TRUE or FALSE.
guidelines.equalSignRequirement: The formula must begin with an ' = ' sign.
guidelines.functionRequirement: The formula must only use <2><0>supported functions</0></2>.
guidelines.introduction: Formulas are defined using a narrow set of functions, with custom variables that correspond to a resident's responses to survey questions. You can optionally use the 'Validate' button to confirm that your formula is formatted properly.
guidelines.title: See formula guidelines

formula.title: Criteria formula
formula.variables: Here are the variables you can use in the formula:

infoURL.description: Enter the URL of the site where residents can learn more about this service. It must be a full URL that begins with 'http' or 'https'
infoURL.error: A valid information URL must be provided
infoURL.title: URL to learn more

instructions.description: Describe how the resident should apply for this service. Use <1>Markdown</1>, if desired, to include paragraphs, italics, bold, links, or lists in this field.
instructions.title: Instructions on how to apply when ready

updateService.markAllUpToDate: Mark all outdated languages as up to date

preparation.description: List documents or resources the resident will need when applying for this service. Use <1>Markdown</1>, if desired, to include paragraphs, italics, bold, links, or lists in this field.
preparation.title: Things needed to apply

updateService.saveMessage: Your changes to the {{language}} translation have been saved.

serviceKey.createDescription: Enter an ID that will be used in URLs to reference the service. It must begin with a capital letter, be 2 or more characters long, and may contain only capital letters, numbers, and underscores. Once saved, this ID cannot be changed.
serviceKey.error: A service ID with only capital letters, numbers, and/or underscores must be provided.
serviceKey.title: Service ID
serviceKey.updateDescription: Enter an ID that is used in URLs to reference the service. This ID cannot be updated.

updateService.submissionWarning: This service is visible to residents. Changes saved here will be reflected in the resident-facing application in a few minutes. Are you sure you would like to save your changes?
updateService.translationMessage: Save your service details in English before returning to add translations.

visibility.description: Services can be visible or hidden from the resident. Ensure a service is up to date (including translations) and ready to be shown to residents before marking it as visible.
visibility.title: Visibility

validationError: Changes could not be saved. Please fix the errors below and try again.
